Entries.default: "About time! Let's drain a goblet or a dozen now!"
"Sluice the ivories and run freely the rum!"
"The meeting's getting bloody merry now."
"Drink deep and oft! And pass me another!"
"To luck and a hot fight and the good captain Brutal Ben!"
"Play it loud and long, Ben! Aye, show 'em how it's done!"
"Steal and plunder! And praise Ondra!"
"To all our shipmates lost to Ondra!"
"Black waters!"
"Is he...?"
"He's toast."
"A toast... To Brutal Ben and his blasted end!"
"Hahaha!"
"What a damned mess. Best tell the crew."
"It's getting festive upstairs. Come on!"
"We'll just go for a bit. No one'll notice we're gone..."
"Hic... Swive him."
"Arrogant scupperlout."
"Someone's about to learn a brutal lesson."
"Can't say he ain't had it coming."
"A Siren song if I ever heard one!"
"Place your bets for the brawl, mates!"
